command.helpheader:
§2----SignVote Help----
§eEach command is in a form of /signvote <subcommand>.

create.help: /signvote create <session name> - create a new session with the given name
create.summary: create a new session with the given name

delete.help: /signvote deletesess <session name> - delete the specified vote session.

addscore.help: addscore - create a vote score limit for the given session and permission if provided
addscore.summary: create a vote score limit for the given session

vote.help: vote - vote to a given votepoint with a provided score
vote.summary: vote to a given votepoint with a provided score

error.reachedlimit: §cYou can't vote anymore with that score!
error.alreadyvoted: §cYou have already voted to this votepoint.

unvote.help: unvote - cancel the vote to a given votepoint
unvote.summary: cancel the vote to a given votepoint

error.notvoted: §cYou have not voted to this votepoint.

error.onlyforplayers: §cThis command can only be run by players.
error.vpexists: §cA votepoint with that name already exists!

votepoint.created: §aVotepoint created with a name of §6{1} §afor the session §6{0}.
votepoint.break:
§eYou are about to break a votepoint.
Type §6/signvote deletevp {0} {1} §eto delete the votepoint.
